description:
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2

Class Description
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeEntitiesRequest The entity analysis request message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeEntitiesResponse The entity analysis response message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeEntitySentimentRequest The entity-level sentiment analysis request message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeEntitySentimentResponse The entity-level sentiment analysis response message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeSentimentRequest The sentiment analysis request message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeSentimentResponse The sentiment analysis response message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeSyntaxRequest The syntax analysis request message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnalyzeSyntaxResponse The syntax analysis response message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnnotateTextRequest The request message for the text annotation API, which can perform multiple analysis types (sentiment, entities, and syntax) in one call.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnnotateTextRequest::Features All available features for sentiment, syntax, and semantic analysis.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::AnnotateTextResponse The text annotations response message.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::DependencyEdge Represents dependency parse tree information for a token.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::DependencyEdge::Label The parse label enum for the token.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Document ================================================================ #

Represents the input to API methods.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Document::Type The document types enum.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::EncodingType Represents the text encoding that the caller uses to process the output.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Entity Represents a phrase in the text that is a known entity, such as a person, an organization, or location.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Entity::Type The type of the entity.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::EntityMention Represents a mention for an entity in the text.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::EntityMention::Type The supported types of mentions.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::LanguageServiceClient Provides text analysis operations such as sentiment analysis and entity recognition.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech Represents part of speech information for a token.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Aspect The characteristic of a verb that expresses time flow during an event.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Case The grammatical function performed by a noun or pronoun in a phrase, clause, or sentence.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Form Depending on the language, Form can be categorizing different forms of verbs, adjectives, adverbs, etc.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Gender Gender classes of nouns reflected in the behaviour of associated words.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Mood The grammatical feature of verbs, used for showing modality and attitude.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Number Count distinctions.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Person The distinction between the speaker, second person, third person, etc.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Proper This category shows if the token is part of a proper name.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Reciprocity Reciprocal features of a pronoun.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Tag The part of speech tags enum.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Tense Time reference.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::PartOfSpeech::Voice The relationship between the action that a verb expresses and the participants identified by its arguments.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Sentence Represents a sentence in the input document.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Sentiment Represents the feeling associated with the entire text or entities in the text.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::TextSpan Represents an output piece of text.
Google::Cloud::Language::V1beta2::Token Represents the smallest syntactic building block of the text.
